title: Ickee Mushta
description: A scraggly story-teller describes a movement started by a mischievous child who grows into a significant political force.Ickee is a study of contrasts: humor and pathos, extrovert and introvert, musical and deaf, liberal and conservative.Ultimately, Ickeeâ€™s cry is for Americans to recognize what is happening to society and elect legislators who will fight to return us to a better balance for all citizens to live a fuller life.
author: Sandy Graham
